commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas76ee3287"

diff:

 		nsToolkitProfileService.cpp \
 		$(NULL)
 
+DEFINES += -DIMPL_XREAPI

 GARBAGE += nsProfileLock.cpp
 
 include $(topsrcdir)/config/rules.mk
